Key Match Events: Jordan and Rashid helped England recover somewhat
Brandon King hit an unbeaten half-century for West Indies
Jason Holder returned career-best figures of four for seven
Pre-Game Insights: England lost the toss and faced challenging conditions
West Indies lost eight of their last nine Twenty20 internationals
Post-Match Reflections: Kieron Pollard said 'Tough times don't last, tough people do'
Eoin Morgan complained about the conditions not matching the warm-up game
Liam Dawson said they'll need a fresh gameplan for the next game
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sheldon Cottrell executed his familiar march-and-salute celebration after Jason Roy completely missed a full toss, lost his middle stump
Tom Banton edged Jason Holder to slip, where Nicholas Pooran took a fine low catch
Dawson set off for a single but slipped when told to turn around, leading to a run-out
